00032 #ifndef WINDOW_H_
00033 #define WINDOW_H_
00034 
00035 #include <QPixmap>
00036 #include <QWidget>
00037 #include <QtGui>
00038 #include <QResizeEvent>
00039 #include <math.h>
00040 
00041 #include "RenderThread.h"
00042 
00043 namespace ebl {
00044 
00048 class Window : public QWidget { 
00049   Q_OBJECT
00050   private:
00051     QPixmap            *pixmap;
00052     QPoint              pixmapOffset;
00053     QPoint              lastDragPos;
00054     double              pixmapScale;
00055     double              curScale;
00056     float               scaleIncr;
00057   public:
00058     RenderThread        thread;
00059 
00060   protected:
00061     void paintEvent(QPaintEvent *event);
00062     void wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event);
00063     void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event);
00064     void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event);
00065     void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event);
00066     
00067   private slots:
00068     void updatePixmap();
00069     void appquit();
00070 
00071   public:
00075     Window(int argc, char **argv, int height = 600, int width = 800);
00076     virtual ~Window();
00077   };
00078 
00081   extern ebl::RenderThread *window;
00082 
00087 #define MAIN_QTHREAD()                          \
00088   using namespace ebl;                          \
00089   int main(int argc, char **argv) {             \
00090     QApplication a(argc, argv);                 \
00091     ebl::Window w(argc, argv);                  \
00092     window = &(w.thread);                       \
00093     w.thread.start();                           \
00094     a.exec();                                   \
00095     return 0;                                   \
00096   }                                             \
00097   void RenderThread::run()
00098 
00099 } // namespace ebl {
00100 
00101 #endif /* WINDOW_H_ */
